frontmatter.title: Lemons Lemons Lemons Lemons
frontmatter.description: 2★ - While the premise, in itself, is brilliant, and the topics brought up are interesting and worth presenting in a play, the play under-delivers on all fronts. I cannot call it anything other than a disappointment.
